bibl.title: An Early Christian Lamp from Aswan Inscribed neopist. <neopist>
bibl.note: Los Angeles, Loyola Marymount University, Archaeological Collections, Inv. 184. Fragment of an Aswan lamp, c. 450-550 A.D. Monogram IX on the discus and (fragmentary) inscription ]neopist[ in the space incircling the discus. <]neopist[>
FULCO William J., An Early Christian Lamp from Aswan Inscribed neopist. <neopist>
